modName: Better Runes - Greater Range and Multiple Cast
summary: With this simple mod, runes spells now have a greater range, you can place them from a very long distance! You can also cast more than one rune at the same time.
descriptionHtml:
Just a simple mod that increase the range that you can place a rune!
You can now hide far from a road and place them. 
With this new version you can now place more than one rune of the different or same element at the same time, this is [i]the perfect rune mod package for Skyrim[/i] ;)

To install this just extract and drag and drop the data folder to your Skyrim folder (where TESV.exe is).

This mod has been request by Kodiak412, on the forum, hope it was what you wanted! ;)

Cheer!
author: AlexP4

files.name: Better Runes - Greater Range and Multiple Cast
